title: Original and Bold
review: This is remarkable filmmaking. I love a film that is so fresh and daring, and this ticks all of those boxes. It is funny, disturbing and profound in equal measure.

title: Entertaining
review: I really loved this movie when I first saw it, but there are some elements that hold it back from being truly great. Nonetheless, it's a fun little maze to get lost in for a couple of hours.

title: A dynamite cast.
review: This is a disturbing and haunting study of trauma, grief and crime. Sean Penn had an extraordinary few years around this period (between this and 'Milk', he delivered the finest performances of his career). He is supported by an amazing cast who all bring their A game.Powerful stuff.
